itemLabel: Mary Mumford, 15th Lady Herries of Terregles

wikipedia_page.main: Mary Katharine Mumford, 15th Lady Herries of Terregles,  (née Fitzalan-Howard; 14 August 1940 – 7 April 2017), was a Scottish peeress and the second of the four daughters of the 16th Duke of Norfolk (and 13th Lord Herries of Terregles) by his wife, The Hon Lavinia Strutt.

response: ***15px Mary Mumford, 15th Lady Herries of Terregles (1940-2017)
